Mendokusai

Tartarus

Ongun Theory

01 Jun 2019

We’re hosting this evening, and so this afternoon I took it upon myself to try to make our apartment look presentable (by which I mean the bits of it that are ‘mine’ - Sam keeps his room and the communal areas immaculate). I was of course hoping to benefit from the legendary WayneDaBang motto;

Tidy environment, tidy mind.

My environment is habitual chaotic as is my brain, and while channeling my inner-Marie Kondo has at least temporarily aided the former, the latter remains to be seen. One thing is clear, and that is that I need to throw a lot of stuff out, which I am excited for. Having a more spacious life certainly seems plus EV.
